text: Hsu ( Culex quinquefasciatus ) and RML12 ( Aedes albopictus ) cells were maintained at 28 ° C in Leibovitz ' s L - 15 medium ( Gibco # 11415 ) containing 10 % tryptose phosphate broth solution , 15 % heat - inactivated fetal bovine serum , and 1 % penicillin - streptomycin solution . West Nile virus ( NY99 - 4132 strain ) was used for the study . C6 / 36 ( Aedes albopictus ) cells were maintained in RPMI medium at 28 ° C and were used to propagate the virus . Vero cells maintained in EMEM at 37 ° C were used for plaque assays .
